problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): Election day volunteers are typically from all different parts of the community, and this year a physician and a line cook were interviewed about their experiences as poll workers. The physician talked about how important elections are, but admitted to having mostly avoided doing any actual work this year and mostly just sat around all day. The line cook, on the other hand, was exhausted after a long and busy day of helping people to vote.
Question: Who was very lazy?
ans0: The line cook
ans1: Can't be determined
ans2: The physician
